author: Sydney Bucksbaum
title: Pink reveals coronavirus diagnosis and donates $1 million to crisis relief funds
description: Pink has revealed that she tested positive for coronavirus two weeks ago and is feeling better now.
content:
Pink has revealed that not only did she test positive for coronavirus two weeks ago, but she has also already beaten it.
Late on Friday, the singer announced on Twitter that she received her diagnosis two weeks ago and has since recovered from it. "Two weeks… [+1443 chars]
